availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Paul Wilhelm Carle (Jefferson County, KY, flour dealer & grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, wholesale flour dealer and grocer. Native of Wurttemberg. Married to Louisa Dieterick Carroll in Jefferson County on March 28, 1864. Father of William Carroll. Grocer in Jefferson County in 1860. Signed a petition as a flour dealer in May 1861 to appoint W. G. Timberlake as flour inspector.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 01, p. 92A.
